faq.title: Any questions? Check out the FAQs
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our Facebook advertising account rental services.
faq.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? We're here to help.

questions.question: How are your Facebook ad accounts different from regular accounts?
questions.answer: Our accounts have higher trust scores, verified metadata, and are optimized to bypass Meta's AI filters. This means fewer ad rejections, longer account lifespan, and better scalability for sensitive products.

questions.question: How long does it take to receive an account after payment?
questions.answer: We deliver accounts within 30-60 minutes of payment confirmation. Our 24/7 support team will guide you through the setup process and answer any questions you have.

questions.question: What happens if my account gets disabled?
questions.answer: We provide account replacement within minutes through our priority Telegram support. Unlike standard providers that take 24-48 hours, we ensure your campaigns keep running with minimal downtime.

questions.question: What types of products can I run?
questions.answer: Our accounts are optimized for high-volume and sensitive niches including Nutra, Crypto, Gaming, and more. Our Premium accounts specifically handle hard-to-approve or heavily violating products with dedicated technical support.

questions.question: Which tools are supported for account management?
questions.answer: We fully support popular anti-detect tools like AdsPower, GoLogin, along with VPS and Proxy solutions. Our team can help you set up the optimal environment for your operations.

questions.question: How is the service fee calculated?
questions.answer: We use a tiered fee structure based on your monthly spend, ranging from 8.5% for $1k-$20k down to 2-4% for spend over $90k. The higher you spend, the lower the percentage, helping you save more as you scale.

questions.question: Can I use my own ad accounts?
questions.answer: Yes! You can use your own pre-vetted infrastructure with $0 setup fee. If you use our accounts, there's a $40 setup fee per account plus 8% fee on total spend.

questions.question: What's included with the free Blue Tick Fanpage?
questions.answer: Our Premium package ($1,500/mo) includes a verified Blue Tick Fanpage, which increases trust and conversion rates. This comes with unlimited campaigns, deep handling for sensitive products, and priority 1-on-1 support.

reviews.name: James Wilson
reviews.text: Switched from regular accounts and never looked back. ROI improved by 40% thanks to premium agency accounts.

reviews.name: Olivia Martinez
reviews.text: Their team helped us scale from $8k to $500k monthly spend without any issues. Incredible service!

reviews.name: Alexander Kim
reviews.text: Running black hat campaigns was never this easy. Great accounts, fast replacements, and reliable support.

reviews.name: Isabella Brown
reviews.text: We've been working with them for 2 years now. Consistent quality and always available when we need help.
